lines.text:
[taking things from a surgery room]
Oh, a pressure cooker, I'll give that to my mother.
I'm a victim of my own verbacity, and I don't even know what that is.

[Two doctors explained they're going to operate on his brain]
Peel back the scalp? Indians!
I'll give Whitey a manicure, he hasn't had one for 10 yeas, or has he?
